subject: Simsonn HS Pro Shifter Inquiry
description_text:
Hi!

I was interested in purchasing a Simsonn HS Pro Shifter the H/SQ Dual-Mode
Racing Simulation Shifter /
https://www.simsonn.com/products/simsonn-hs-pro-dual-mode-shifter and I
wanted to ask if the shifter comes with a desk mount? I see it can be
screwed into a rig but I did not see information regarding a desk mount or
desk mount accessory.

-- 
Best Regards,
Luis Garcia

conversations.body_text: Hi Luis Garcia,     It is compatible with this bracket.Â   https://www.simsonn.com/products/desktop-fixed-1
